entry.title: From NumPy to PyTorch, A Story of API Compatibility
entry.summary:
Description

NumPy has grown to be a vital part of the data science workflow for everyone from astrophysicists to zoologists. This talk is about how PyTorch approaches being “NumPy-compatible,” and why the PyTorch community thinks that’s important, why it can be challenging, and why sometimes it’s necessary to …
entry.content:
Description

NumPy has grown to be a vital part of the data science workflow for everyone from astrophysicists to zoologists. This talk is about how PyTorch approaches being “NumPy-compatible,” and why the PyTorch community thinks that’s important, why it can be challenging, and why sometimes it’s necessary to be divergent from NumPy’s behavior.

Slides: https://www.slideshare.net/MikeRuberry1/from-numpy-to-pytorch
